text:
Several plotting functions do not seem to mention the "threshold" argument in their respective docstrings. This appears to be the case for: plot_epi, plot_roi and plot_stat_map.

Should those be added?
title: nilearn.plotting: threshold argument not in docstring
nilearn.plotting: threshold argument not in docstring

text: That'd be great. You could reuse the threshold parameter doc in plot_img. You could even improve it, in particular I would use something like values below the threshold **in absolute value** to be more clear.
